    Bio

    My name is Juris Andersons. I am an IT professional with more than 20 years of experience. I create products. Occasionally play guitar, produce, record live music and videos.

    Surviving IT industry this long, inevitably means, that you should have learned something. Sure, I could state, that I care for good solutions, client's businesses, added value, etc, in reality, it is much more complicated than that.

    What I care about is good experience and flow for everybody. Usually, it is described as a journey. Whatever we do, it is always a trip. No matter is it a programmer, a product stakeholder, a product owner, I tend to ensure that everybody is in the flow towards the goal.

    ... and then there are deadlines.
